lead_paragraph: Russia’s Olympic ban and China’s ruthless selection policy helped pave the way for Thailand's Sopita Tanasan win the first weightlifting gold medal of the Rio Games in the women’s 48kg on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Weightlifting: Tanasan Takes First Gold for Thailand
headline.main: Weightlifting: Tanasan Takes First Gold for Thailand

snippet: Russia’s Olympic ban and China’s ruthless selection policy helped pave the way for Thailand's Sopita Tanasan win the first weightlifting gold medal of the Rio Games in the women’s 48kg on Saturday....
